name: GBJam10 - Potbound
description:
[NOTE] The jam version of the game has a bug where the full ending doesn't show unless you finish the game with 5 health. We have left the jam version as the web playable version and we hope you enjoy regardless.

Everything becomes trash eventually.

When a bruised onion finds a dying plant in the trash, he agrees to help her find her way out and back to her place on the windowsill. Potbound is a short narrative adventure about power and hope.

Controls

INPUTSKEYSUPup arrow, W
DOWNdown arrow, S
LEFTleft arrow, A
RIGHTright arrow, D
Aalt, z, j
Bctrl, k, x
StartEnterSelectShift
